name: Markup Compatibility and Extensibility (MCE), ISO 29500-3:2008-2015, also ECMA-376, Editions 1-4.
definition: An encoding format that defines a set of conventions for forward compatibility of markup specifications, applicable not only to Open Office XML specifications, but also to other markup specifications using XML. These conventions allow XML documents created by applications of later versions or extensions to be handled by applications of earlier versions. The MCE specification is part 3 of ISO/IEC 29500, Information technology -- Document description and processing languages -- Office Open XML File Formats (OOXML).
